DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate metabolic parameter previously sedentary individual eccentric endurance training ( hike downwards ) . Study participant regularly hike downwards difference altitude 540 meter 8 week . For opposite way , cable car use . Metabolic profile obtain baseline 8 week period eccentric endurance exercise .
DOC.criteria: men woman age 18 year previous systematic endurance training ( > 3 time per week > 30 min ) body mass index > 35 kg/mÂ² heavy smoking ( > 20 cigarette per day ) regular alcohol consumption > 60g per day history cardiovascular disease establish musculoskeletal disease unwillingness stay area whole period
